title: Goodies Berlin - Warschauer Str
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery
description: One of the many Goodies locations; this one became all-veg since Jun 2013. Offers bagels, cakes, salads, desserts, and coffee with vegan choices like tofu bagel, rice pudding with apples, banana bread, green smoothies, and raw cake. Food is made in-house with ingredients listed. Has Wi-Fi, sofas and space to sit around.
